ganymede:blackboard.github.io mbk$ cat READTHIS.txt
bundle exec jekyll serve

To sync to upstream
  507  git fetch upstream

  509  git checkout master
  510  git merge upstream/master
       git push origin master
  511  cat .git/config
  512  history

FUTURE instructions After Git Switch to main - NOT YET!!!

  507  git fetch upstream

  509  git checkout main
  510  git merge upstream/main
  -- make changes
       git push origin main
  511  cat .git/config
  512  history
